verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: welcomed] [ARG1: Kim Kardashian] [ARG2: to the White House] [ARGM-TMP: last week] [ARGM-PRP: to discuss prison reform] . But there was something else on his mind .
President Donald Trump welcomed [ARG0: Kim Kardashian] to the White House last week to [V: discuss] [ARG1: prison reform] . But there was something else on his mind .
President Donald Trump welcomed Kim Kardashian to the White House last week to discuss prison reform . But there [V: was] [ARG1: something else] [ARGM-LOC: on his mind] .
